attribute.description: Name of the attribute to be used in the condition.

operator.description: Operator to be used in the condition. Allowed values are: equals, notEquals, greaterThan, greaterThanOrEquals, lessThan, lessThanOrEquals, contains, notContains, startsWith, endsWith, semverEquals, semverNotEquals, semverGreaterThan, semverGreaterThanOrEquals, semverLessThan, semverLessThanOrEquals, in, notIn.

value.description: Value to be used in the condition. Can be a string, number, boolean, or array of strings.

and.description: The list of conditions to be combined with the 'and' operator.

or.description: The list of conditions to be combined with the 'or' operator.
The list of conditions to be combined with the 'not' operator.

archived.description: Indicates whether the segment is archived or not.

description.description: Human readable description of the segment for documentation purposes.

conditions.description: The set of conditions to be evaluated for the segment.

description: JSON Schema for creating Featurevisor segment, expressed in YAML
